original_text: Now there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon, and this man was righteous and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel, and the Holy Spirit was upon him.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 시므온이라 하는 사람이 있으니 이 사람은 의롭고 경건하여 이스라엘의 위로를 기다리는 자라 성령이 그 위에 계시더라

sentences.original_text: Now there was a man in Jerusalem
and this man was righteous and devout
waiting for the consolation of Israel
and the Holy Spirit was upon him
